snippet: Former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi of Italy said Tuesday that he would not seek re-election next spring in order to regroup the center-right and pose a viable challenge to the center-left.
abstract: Former Italian Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi says that he will not seek re-election in spring in order to regroup the center-right, regain disaffected voters and pose a viable challenge to the center-left, which is leading in opinion polls.
lead_paragraph: Former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi of Italy said Tuesday that he would not seek re-election next spring in order to regroup the center-right and pose a viable challenge to the center-left.

headline.seo: Italy: Silvio Berlusconi Will Not Seek Re-election
headline.main: Italy: Berlusconi Will Not Seek Re-election as Premier
headline.print_headline: Italy: Berlusconi Will Not Seek Re-election as Premier Next Year
